caption.p: Virus outbreak dynamics for the extreme values of virulence and free-living survival considered for the two different relationships (positive or negative) between virulence and survival traits: these plots are similar to the illustrative dynamics in Figure 1. Here, we observe the dynamics of disease corresponding to the extreme values presented in Table 5 and Table 6. Subfigures ( A, C, E, G) depict disease dynamics, and ( B, D, F, H) depict the dynamics of contaminated environments. ( A– D) correspond to the parameter values considered for the positive correlation scenario, while ( E– H) correspond to the negative correlation scenario.
